fko.tetris.game

Class TetrisGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • fko.tetris.game.TetrisGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer

    public class TetrisGame
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
    This represents the state of a Tetris game. It holds all information necessary to represent a Tetris game at any point in time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NEXTQUEUE_SIZE
      Sets how many Tetriminos are in the next queue.

      Creates a Tetris game with default values

      Creates a Tetris game with a specified start level.

    • Field Detail

      • NEXTQUEUE_SIZE

        public static final int NEXTQUEUE_SIZE
        Sets how many Tetriminos are in the next queue. Not necessarily the same as how many are shown in the ui.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
